column2:
"<%me>.
Before I begin, I must ask that you keep this request a secret from my brother."
"In the spirit of Christmas, I would like to give something to my brother, Luther."
"In the spirit of Christmas, I would like to give something to my brother, Luther."
"The two of us are always busy, I with the business of government, he with his research. We so rarely find time to enjoy dinner together any more."
"I thought to give him a set of matching glasses, which we could use for our meals together."
"I thought to give him a set of matching glasses, which we could use for our meals together."

"Unfortunately, I am having difficulty locating the right material from which to make these glasses...
Would you be able to aid me?"
